title: Cognitive-Emotional Integration Strategies for Designing Multimodal Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic learning theories and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Targeting learners aiming to enhance data analysis and communication competencies in social science disciplines

learning_goals: Learners can design learning scenarios utilizing multimodal content (text, images, audio, interactive elements).
Learners can apply cognition-emotion theory-based design principles (activity guidance, reflection facilitation, feedback provision) to real-world cases.
Learners can create educational modules in an LMS environment that integrate self-directed learner control and prior learning elements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
